summary: IN COLD WEATHER, THE DRIVER DOOR WOULD NOT OPEN FROM OUTSIDE OR INSIDE.  ALL OTHER DOORS WORKED PROPERLY.  AT INITIAL SERVICE REQUEST, PROBLEM WOULD NOT DUPLICATE ONCE CAR WAS WARM.  SERVICE MANAGER SAID HE'D SEEN THIS PROBLEM PREVIOUSLY.  AFTER PHONE CALLS, EMAILS, AND DIAGNOSTIC SERVICE APPOINTMENT ,VW DID REPLACE THE DOOR LATCH ASSEMBLY AT NO CHARGE.  RETAIL REPLACEMENT WAS QUOTED AT $500.  CONCERN IS OF UTMOST IMPORTANCE BECAUSE POTENTIAL EXISTED THAT I COULD NOT EXIT MY CAR IN AN EMERGENCY.
